Algoholics | Algorithms Study Group Algoholics Algorithms Study Group

About

Algoholics is a study group created by NTUA students. Our community meets regularly and arranges talks on various topics of computer science. If you want to attend a meeting as part of the audience or even as a speaker, feel free to join our facebook group to be updated. You can also check our projects in our github page.
